attributes.action: Introduce a reasonable minium wage for apprentices in skilled jobs.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Apprentices in skilled jobs, currently do not have a minimum wage, allowing the young and eager skilled workers of the future to be exploited.  Quite often a job on the checkout at Tesco will pay more than an apprentice will earn. Is it any wonder we have a shortage of skilled workers?

rejection.details: There is a similar petition at: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/appreticeship/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
